sentences.sContent: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.sContent_eng: And on each of those issues we have said that we would consider that and, in fact, have provided some humanitarian support.
sentences.sCn: 对于每一件这样的事情，我们都说过，我们将会对此进行考虑，事实上，我们向他们提供了人道主义援助。

sentences.sContent: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.sContent_eng: But part of trying to do what is right for the Burmese people is to provide humanitarian assistance in this time of extreme need.
sentences.sCn: 但是，对缅甸人民来说，正确的行动部分是为他们提供人道主义援助，而在目前这个时刻更是极端的需要”。

sentences.sContent: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.sContent_eng: But otherwise, it is best left to the humanitarian experts, who will be there after you are gone and therefore need to preserve their independence and their impartiality.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果不能，最好将这些任务留给人道主义专家，这些专家在部队撤退之后仍将留在那，因此需要保持他们的独立和公正。

synos.tran: 人道主义的；博爱的；基督凡人论的
人道主义者；慈善家；博爱主义者；基督凡人论者

人文主义的；人道主义的
人文主义的；人道主义的
人道地；富人情地；慈悲地
人类；人道；仁慈；人文学科
人道主义者；人类学者，人文学者；人文主义者
